programme.desc: Actor Gu Bon-seung shows the warmth and purity of life in the village along the river, and presents how new history was made and became one’s memory.

programme.title: Dear X
programme.desc: <Dear X> follows Baek Ah-jin, a top actress who leverages her beauty and popularity to further her career through manipulation. She harbors a lot of grudges behind her somewhat good-natured demeanor.

programme.title: Curtain Up, Class!
programme.desc: Actor Kim Tae-ri and Choi Hyun-wook turns into a drama club teacher at a rural elementary school. Together with the students, they will bring a heart-warming drama performance to viewers.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber’s license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: Beauty in a Click
programme.desc: Inspired by Get It Beauty, tvN Asia’s new original beauty and wellness program sharing self-care tips to audiences about Life & Balance.

programme.title: You Can Cook With Sam Kim
programme.desc: Star chef Sam Kim will teach you how to make all kinds of delicious dishes – from Italian pasta, Spanish food to desserts! Follow his easy recipes and enjoy cooking!

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: Yumi's Cells
programme.desc: Adapted from the popular webtoon of the same title, it tells the story of an ordinary office worker Yumi through the eyes of her brain cells, which controlled her thoughts, feelings and actions.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: Cha's Family
programme.desc: From Thailand to Japan, the cast explore bold local flavors, craft their own signature spicy sauce, and bring Korea’s passion for heat to a global stage—mixing food, culture, and adventure into one sizzling journey.

programme.title: The Village Barber
programme.desc: Park Bo-gum, who holds a national barber’s license, and his close friends Lee Sang-yi and Kwak Dong-yeon run a special barbershop in a remote rural village, tending to both hair and hearts.

programme.title: The Genius Paik 3
programme.desc: Chef Paik returns with his dream team and takes on the challenge to introduce Korean cuisine in France.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A life-changing story of a man who has lived as a loner his entire life. Jae Shik begins to live together with a child with a hearing-visual disability, as they change each other's lives and try to find a way to communicate.

programme.title: The Golden Holiday
programme.desc: Byeong-Soo works as a detective in the countryside and takes his family on a trip to the Philippines. He becomes involved in a crime planned by Patric, becoming a murder suspect.

programme.title: The Hitman'S Bodyguard
programme.desc: The world's top bodyguard gets a new client, a hitman who must testify at the International Criminal Court. They must put their differences aside and work together to make it to the trial on time.

programme.title: Railroad Tigers
programme.desc: A railroad worker in China in 1941 leads a team of freedom fighters against the Japanese in order to get food for the poor.

programme.title: Deliver Us From Evil
programme.desc: An assassin goes to Thailand in order to solve a kidnapping case and finds himself chased by a man whose sibling he killed.

programme.title: Domino
programme.desc: A Copenhagen police officer seeks justice for his partner's murder by a mysterious man.

programme.title: Hot Blooded
programme.desc: A veteran gangster looking to retire from a life of crime in the violent port town of Kuam, Korea unexpectedly gets caught in the middle of a mob war with bloody consequences.

programme.title: The Roundup: No Way Out
programme.desc: Seven years after the roundup in Vietnam, Ma Seok-do joins a new squad to investigate a murder case. He soon starts to dig deeper when he finds out the case involves a synthetic drug and a gang of thugs.

programme.title: Nefarious
programme.desc: On the day of his scheduled execution, a convicted serial killer gets a psychiatric evaluation during which he claims he is a demon, and further claims that before their time is over, the psychiatrist will commit three murders of his own.

programme.title: Mr-9: Do Or Die
programme.desc: An elite Bangladeshi spy teams up with a CIA operative to bring down an international criminal organization headed by a ruthless businessman.

programme.title: Dragons Forever
programme.desc: Three successful Hong Kong lawyers are hired by a chemical company of questionable ethics and must eventually make a difficult decision when their employer's motives become clear.

programme.title: Stockholm
programme.desc: Based on the absurd but true 1973 bank heist and hostage crisis in Stockholm that was documented in the New Yorker as the origins of the 'Stockholm Syndrome‘, a condition in which hostages develop a psychological bond with their captors.

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: A musical drama about a wife who asks her husband to help her find her childhood sweetheart as a birthday present. Though reluctant, her husband's only choice is to set out on this journey with her.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Experience a chronological recounting of the Apollo 13 near-disaster, one of NASA’s most devastating—and finest—moments. Witness the events of April 1970 as they unfolded through news footage, mission control audio, and NASA archives.

programme.title: The Lost Tapes S2
programme.desc: Examine the 2002 sniper attacks in Washington D.C. through police audio and video, as well as local and national news reports. The sniper’s three-week reign of terror triggered one of the most intense and complicated manhunts in American history.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: In this episode, we explore the foundations of Cryptocurrency and talk to the local crypto pioneers who risked it all.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: Now we know why Crypto is such a big deal, through this episode we’ll meet the family behind one of NZ’s biggest Crypto success stories. We’ll dispel some crypto myths and cover the basics of how to get on board.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: CEO Aaron McDonald and Co-Founder Brooke Howard-Smith tell us how they created a multi-million dollar NFT business here in Aotearoa and are collaborating with international superstars.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: It's an inspirational episode, we spend time with the team taking Māori to the metaverse and check-in on a couple of local disrupters focused on making digital worlds where everyone feels like they can belong.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: What if Bitcoin mining could actually save the world? Over this episode, we meet the local company on a mission to use it to help solve global warming.

programme.title: WTF Is Crypto?
programme.desc: We profile Kaye-Maree Dunn, an innovator developing digital data sovereignty and we find out how NFTs can allow us to own our own artificial intelligence. It's an episode that will blow your mind.

programme.title: Gameplay: The Story Of The Videogame Revolution
programme.desc: Gameplay is a feature on the history of videogames. From Pong to Pac Man, Super Mario to Lara Croft, Doom, Grand Theft Auto and beyond, we chronicle the remarkable story of the fastest evolving new media of all time.

programme.title: Cristiano Ronaldo: The One And Only
programme.desc: Witness the journey from the young Portuguese prodigy to one of the greatest players of all time. This is the one and only...Cristiano Ronaldo.

programme.title: Gerrard: Born To Lead
programme.desc: In an illustrious professional career that spans over 20 years, Gerrard has experienced and succeeded at the pinnacle of the sport, lifting trophies as a player and manager, and representing his country. But with the highs, came the lows.

programme.title: Kate Winslet: Leading Lady
programme.desc: Oscar-winner Kate Winslet, known for Titanic, is celebrated for her versatile, intense performances in both Hollywood blockbusters and indie films, cementing her as one of the finest actors of her generation.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: Witness the fighter-bomber F-111 in action, from the jungle battles of Vietnam to the desert wars of the Middle East.

programme.title: Air Warriors S10
programme.desc: See how the P-47 Thunderbolt dominated the skies while dealing destruction on the ground in both Germany and the Pacific.

programme.title: The Real Mad Men Of Advertising
programme.desc: See how advertisers used a new optimism and new technology to sell big in the "Greed is Good" era.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s primate team prepare to welcome a new birth.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: Auckland Zoo’s vet team commences critical care to save the life of an endangered sea turtle snared on a fishing line, and after 3 years without tigers at the Zoo, the team stand by to welcome a new big cat.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: We follow Auckland Zoo’s bird team into the wilds of the Coromandel Ranges as they help to save native kiwi populations, It’s a feeding frenzy for the Tasmanian devils and the elephant team faces their biggest challenge yet.

programme.title: Wild Heroes
programme.desc: This time on Wild Heroes, there's shocking news for the elephant team, the vets are concerned about one of their rescued Little penguins, and we find out how it really does take a community to feed the Zoo.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena visits a city steeped in tradition... and gravy, as he indulges in hearty planted-based Quebecois classics—poutine, smoked “meat” sandwiches, tourtiere, and the famous Montreal bagel.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the Big Easy, Mena explores a charming host of plant-based Louisiana staples—vegan beignets, gumbo, biscuits and po boys—with food historian Zella Palmer and cookbook author Timothy Pakron. As an aperitif, he sips his way through a lesson in cocktails created in the heart of the grand city of New Orleans.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Mena feasts with magician and Vegas legend Penn Jillette. He explores the off-strip Sin City vegan food scene, indulging in plant-based “Beef” Wellington, sky-high waffles, and intricate dim sum, then dines with cookbook author Carleigh Bodrug.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: Bathed in sunshine and Big Latin Culture, Mena learns to make classic Cubanos and traditional Puerto Rican mofongo—vegan-style. He cruises the seas with cookbook author Radhi Devlukia, takes actor Matt Murray to South Beach for mouth-watering molten lava cake, and harvests and tastes astonishing exotic fruits.

programme.title: Evolving Vegan S2
programme.desc: In the heart of Japan, Mena devours plant-based sushi and ramen. He learns to cook soba noodles from scratch, home-made mochi, and takes part in a traditional tea ceremony.

programme.title: A New Zealand Food Story S3
programme.desc: Ben experiences the art of cheese making. He meets a capsicum producer and learns about the provenance of the onion.

programme.title: Essence Of India
programme.desc: Samira convinces chefs to part with their secrets, cooks with street vendors and wanders into ancient spice markets to give you a peek into India’s rich culinary heritage.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren commences his second Food Trail of South Africa in the world famous Kruger National Park and surrounds.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Johannesburg - the gateway city to exploring South Africa! In this episode Warren indulges in the vibrant international flavours and surrounds of the Sandton neighbourhood, loved by locals and visitors alike.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: The wild northeast coast of South Africa is like nothing you’ve seen. And it’s here Warren will find himself romanced by empty beaches, rugged open oceans, and waterways filled with wild hippopotamus.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: In this episode, Warren experiences the abundance of wildlife here, centering his experience around tracking and finding the elusive and endangered African Wild Dog.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: A true hidden gem of South Africa, the Garden Route is a 200km stretch of coastal highway known for its beguiling diversity and unparalleled spirit of wilderness.

programme.title: Food Trail: South Africa S2
programme.desc: Warren has arrived into Cape Town. This won’t be your average culinary exploration of a city; Warren has dedicated the entire episode to diving into a specific style of South African cooking known as ‘Cape Malay’.

programme.desc: Eep gets struck with the crush curse when cute new guy, Kevin, comes to Ahhh! Valley. Her and Grug do everything they can to break the curse's hold/ Thunk starts to hang out with liyotes against Grug's wishes when he has a hard time fitting in with kids from school.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim must surrender to Bular and unlock the Killahead Bridge to save kidnapped Blinky and promises Claire that he will get her brother back.

programme.title: Trollhunters: Tales of Arcadia
programme.desc: Jim yearns to save Claires brother Meanwhile Strickler takes a field trip to find help in his quest for power

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Fired from Baby Corp and trying to build their own business, Boss Baby and Tina waste all their startup funds immediately, requiring a loan from Banker Baby Benny. In order to receive their seed money and get their company rolling, they have to rebuild the town’s faith in a baby who made everyone miss a huge sporting even (and they have to do it on a very limited budget)

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in the Crib
programme.desc: Unable to land baby clients, Boss and Tina take in a naughty little puppy as a side hustle, trying to earn a little extra scrap. But once they discover the dogs in the neighborhood are stealing for a puppy trainer named Becker, the mission gets much bigger, and our team is forced to earn a little Puppy Love for once.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy and Branch switch bodies, and learn to appreciate each other’s point of view. /When Branch decides it’s time for him to move out of the bunker, Poppy tries to be as supportive as she can, even though it seems Branch himself may have some doubts.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Following the events of the “Branch Bum,” the Trolls become lost in a series of wormholes, each of which leads to a new and strange alternate world. The Snack Pack must work together in order to find their way back home/In order to psych the Snack Pack up for collecting the confetti from Confetti-fest, DJ Suki unveils the catchiest song ever written. But when the song proves a little too catchy, Poppy will do anything to help get the song out of her friends’ heads.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh's plan to save Elrod turns into a battle to save earth from Elrod

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: In the season opener, George and Harold have returned to school due to a technicality, but the school has been taken over by Melvin and a cyborg Melvin from the future! Their goal is to make the school extremely difficult by replacing all the teachers with Teachertron robots. Suffering under the new regime and without Mr. Krupp/Captain Underpants on hand to help, the boys hypnotize gym teacher Mr. Meaner and turn him into Sergeant Boxers to fight back.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: The kids are low on supplies in the Sahara and stumble on a town with a well that has mysteriously run dry. The crew decides to investigate and discovers a Cleve Kelso-controlled water facility that’s stealing water from the village. They manage to blow up the facility, but it alerts Rafaela and Matsuo to their whereabouts.

programme.title: Fast & Furious: Spy Racers
programme.desc: In an awesome chase/battle through the desert, the crew goes up against Rafaela, Matsuo, and Sandocal – who are driving the kids’ own cars. The crew struggles to fight back while also not losing the trail to Cleve’s base in the desert. When Rafaela turns on Sandocal, he and Layla decide to work together and manage to overpower Rafaela and Matsuo. Sandocal tells the kids to go to escape toward the Bedouin Shield.

programme.desc: Nostalgia aims to represent Chinese traditional culture by revealing life in villages in the way of story-telling. programme.title: Unkind Ladies
programme.desc: This drama features the women of three generations and people around them. Mari grows up as a good teacher of this generation where there is no true mentor. Hyeonsuk, who has been a troublemaker, realizes the love and support of her family. Kang Sunok regards herself as unlucky, but later on realizes how happy she has been. How can you hold up when your life gets tough? You will figure it out by holding up day by day, just like these women in the drama.

programme.title: Glaciers
programme.desc: Glaciers possess a very special kind of “power.” They have acted as a catalyst for the birth and evolution of life on Earth. Glaciers are the source of human life and one of the most important partners in the Earth's climate system. However, due to global warming, glaciers are gradually disappearing. What, then, is happening to glaciers? This documentary explores what we must do to prevent the disappearance of glaciers, which may threaten the future of the Earth.

programme.desc: A love story between Kim Youngho, a flawless personal trainer struggling to overcome his childhood injury, and Kang Jueun, who used to be an icon of first love but is just an overweight lawyer now.

programme.desc: Richard Blais gets an authentic Cuban sandwich, Ross Mathews pleads guilty to a sinful biscuit sandwich and Carnie Wilson shares a salad made of tater tots!

programme.title: Guy's Chance Of A Lifetime (S1)
programme.desc: The candidates travel to Branson, MO, to host a Chicken Guy! pop-up at Guy Fieri's Branson Kitchen and Bar.

programme.title: Wildcard Kitchen (S2)
programme.desc: With $30,000 of their own hard-earned cash on the line, former champions Maneet Chauhan, Tiffani Faison and Chris Oh are hungry for repeat victory.

programme.title: No-Recipe Road Trip With The Try Guys (S1)
programme.desc: The Try Guys visit Charleston, South Carolina, where they test drive a pair of vintage mobile pizza ovens and race to feed 20 hungry diners.

programme.title: Simply Giada (S1)
programme.desc: Eating well doesn't mean depriving yourself of the comfort foods you crave.

programme.title: Giada At Home (S9)
programme.desc: Giada makes a special meal for her aunt to celebrate the arrival of her new baby. The menu features chicken with chickpeas and chocolate hazelnut banana bread.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible (S16)
programme.desc: After losing $4,000 a month, Andrew, a pastor and owner of restaurant Loyd Have Mercy in Titusville, FL, has lost hope of turning things around.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew & 'que (S5)
programme.desc: In Sagaponack, NY, Michael Symon heads to a smokehouse where succulent, slow-smoked pork ribs are mopped with a tangy, citrus barbecue sauce.

programme.title: Burgers, Brew & 'que (S5)
programme.desc: Michael Symon heads to Providence for a traditional Rhode Island hot wiener in a crepe topped with chili.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins And Dives: Triple D Nation (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri grabs seconds of smoked bacon meatloaf in Atlanta, competition-style barbecue in Scottsdale, AZ, and a next-level burger in Fort Worth, TX.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins And Dives: Triple D Nation (S6)
programme.desc: Guy Fieri eats his way through out-of-bounds risotto in Atlanta, real deal relleno in Anthem, AZ, and succulent snapper in Arlington, TX.

programme.title: Chopped (S57)
programme.desc: Four talented chefs are thrilled to compete in a battle celebrating Chinese cuisine!

programme.title: Jose Andres & Family In Spain (S1)
programme.desc: In Valencia, Chef José Andrés and his daughters enjoy Las Fallas, the magnificent festival of fire, and learn the secrets of making Spain's world-famous paella.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)
programme.desc: During WWII, the Nazis stole vast amounts of art, gold, silver, and currency, and stashed them across Europe. While some of the plunder has been recovered, much more is still missing nearly 80 years later.

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: Amidst financial troubles, Disney hires an ingenious marketing whiz who helps them figure out how to bring their beloved characters off the screen and into the hands of millions.

programme.title: Pawn Stars (S23)

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: A new, subsurface investigation on Skinwalker Ranch leads to a baffling discovery near Homestead Two.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S4)

programme.title: Holy Marvels With Dennis Quaid (S2)

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S5)
programme.desc: Over seven hundred years ago, a religious order protected a vast treasure of gold, precious gems, and relics... and then it all mysteriously vanished. What happened to the hoard of the Knights Templar?

programme.title: Lost U-Boats Of WWII
programme.desc: After finding Nazi artifacts at a sunken pier, Darrell continues his search to a site known as Target 3 where they find a possible component of a Nazi secret weapon that changes their investigation.

programme.title: Alone (S11)
programme.desc: With only four people remaining, food insecurity reaches an all-time high. One participant's prized harvest is pilfered, while another survivalist battles a debilitating sickness.

programme.title: Megamol
programme.desc: A rich old lady, who was dying, hired a detective agency to go in search of her long lost granddaughter. Lacking the manpower for the job, janitor Andrew E was passed off as a private detective.

programme.title: Ikaw Ang Mahal Ko
programme.desc: The King of the Philippine Movies and the Star for All Seasons team up in this hilarious and heartwarming romantic comedy. FPJ and Vilma Santos meet in the most bungling of situations and they become fast enemies.

programme.title: I Love You Sabado
programme.desc: Heaven makes mistakes too. Janno was killed before his time and must be sent back to earth. However, the Chief Angel found out that he was due to die in one week's time, or next Saturday or Sabado and he would go to hell.

programme.title: Bukas May Pangarap
programme.desc: A peasant couple set all their worldly possesions so that the husband can take advantage of an overseas job offer. But a tragedy is bound to bring his marriage and family life to ruin.

programme.title: Bruce Liit
programme.desc: Bruce (Niño Muhlach) is eager to learn karate specially when he sees his father practice. But Miguel (Ramon Zamora) keeps on postponing his son's instruction deeming Bruce too young to appreciate the principles behind this particular vocation.

programme.title: Ang Pumatay Ng Dahil Sa'yo
programme.desc: Sergeant Emilio Sanchez is a dedicated military man. He believes that Filipinos should stand on their own and not be taken by the Americans.

programme.title: Hiram Na Mukha
programme.desc: Famous plastic surgeon Dr. Hugo (Christopher de Leon) worships the ground his fiancee Alicia (Nanette Medved) walks on. That is because he feels Alicia is his creation.

programme.title: Trabaho Lang Dear, Walang Personalan
programme.desc: Former carnival workers Leo and Amanda were trying to make a living by doing all sorts of jobs. From Dyesebel and Babaing Gagamba, Amanda was now a security guard by day and a nightclub bunny by night.

programme.title: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas
programme.desc: Sgt. Ernesto Baliola: Tinik Sa Batas

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Ang Boyfriend Kong Gamol (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Alice Dixson plays a rich woman who returns in the country with a plan to reach out to the poor and stop poverty. She decides to disguise herself so she can penetrate the poor community and in the process she meets Andrew E and falls in love with him despite their social differences.

programme.title: Love Notes
programme.desc: The popular radio and TV show for lonely hearts hosted by DJ Joe D'Mango came to the big screen with two stories of young love based on letters from listeners.

programme.title: Hindi Pahuhuli Ng Buhay (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: An assassination attempt by rebels on a police officer was foiled by ex-convict Robin.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Middle East
programme.desc: From Dubai, connecting Asian markets to the European opens - this show focuses on global macro issues with a Middle Eastern context.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield

programme.title: The Notebook
programme.desc:
Behind every great love is a great story.
In Seabrook, South Carolina in the 1940s, teenaged debutante Allie Hamilton and local boy Noah Calhoun spend one passionate, carefree summer together and deeply in love. But when the summer ends, war and duty separate the young couple.
Today, an elderly man visits a nursing home to read from his notebook to a woman whose memory is fading. As he spins a tale of two young lovers with their whole lives before them, his beloved Allie relives a long-ago passion that has never died, an unbreakable bond between two ordinary people rendered extraordinary by the strength, power and beauty of true love.
Based on the novel by Nicholas Sparks, author of A Walk to Remember and Message in a Bottle.

programme.desc: Michael stumps a delivery man by pulling live crabs out of a Chinese food order and leaves a mother and daughter in disbelief by using a spinning bowl to extract peanuts from candy. Plus, he puts one man in a serious ethical dilemma.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 5
programme.desc: This week, Michael stuns shoppers at a thrift mart with a remarkably advanced antique that self-tailors clothes and a chalkboard that solves mathematical equations. And at a hardware store, a DIYer is left questioning the intelligence of beetles that follow blueprints and unscrew nuts and bolts. Plus, one woman is shocked and bewildered when Michael disappears and reappears before her very eyes.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 8
programme.desc: Filling in as a karate instructor, Michael disrupts the Zen of his student with skills that literally lift him off the ground, and at a toy store, Michael's frog necklace is so fashionably realistic that it has one little girl begging for a new pet. programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 9

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 10

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Your mind is the scene of the crime. Box-office superstar Leonardo DiCaprio stars in this contemporary science fiction action film set "within the architecture of the mind." Written, directed and produced by Oscar and Golden Globe nominee Christopher Nolan (The Dark Knight, Batman Begins, The Prestige), this eagerly awaited follow-up to 2008's billion-dollar blockbuster is yet another visionary tale from a startingly original filmmaker who continually raises the bar with every film he makes. Shooting in London, Paris, Tangiers, Calgary and Los Angeles, Nolan's mind-bending film also stars Academy Award winners Michael Caine and Marion Cotillard, in addition to Juno's Ellen Page, Batman Begins' Cillian Murphy and Oscar nominees Ken Watanabe (The Last Samurai) and Tom Berenger (Platoon).

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: Academy Award nominees Leonardo DiCaprio and Djimon Hounsou join Academy Award winner Jennifer Connelly in this action drama from Ed Zwick, the filmmaker behind The Last Samurai. DiCaprio stars as Danny Archer, a mercenary smuggler searching for a priceless diamond amid the chaos of Sierra Leone's civil war; Hounsou (Gladiator), as a desperate father searching for his lost son; and Connelly (A Beautiful Mind), as a reporter searching for the truth behind the trade in 'conflict diamonds.' Forced to confront the brutal human cost of the diamond trade, Archer changes his search for financial reward to a quest for redemption.

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.title: Watch Me Kill
programme.desc: A ruthless assassin named Luciana is hired by a kingpin to murder a man with a valuable diamond. Complications ensue when Luciana stumbles upon a teenage girl who is held captive by the man, and the kingpin discovers that the diamond Luciana turned over is fake.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: The Possession of Leah Dela Cruz
programme.desc: A female cop moves into a small town, and gets drawn to a case that involves a girl who is possessed by an evil spirit.

programme.title: Detective Dee's Seven Deadly Sin
programme.desc: Detective Dee becomes embroiled in a series of murders that shake the Tang Empire. The killer invokes the "Seven Deadly Sins" to justify a twisted sense of justice. In his relentless pursuit of the truth, Detective Dee uncovers the mask of false righteousness and exposes the darkness hidden beneath.

programme.title: Mama Ghost
programme.desc: In a coastal town, a forbidden romance sparks between Rico and Sisca, and their love unleashes a malevolent spirit. As chilling deaths plague the town, past secrets are being unraveled and the town is possessed by evil and fear. Rico must defy destiny and fight against the evil spirit to save his loved one.

programme.title: Hostage
programme.desc: A high school cheerleader, Ashley, is adopted by the killers who murdered her parents. She is horrified to find out the truth during a home robbery years later, and must choose to either escape or be part of this family for good.

programme.title: Zhong Kui Exorcism
programme.desc: After hunting fox demons, Zhong Kui returns to Heyang Village only to discover that his lover and neighbours have been slaughtered. Following the trail to Lingdu City, he encounters Princess Liu Li, who has been cursed into a half-human, half-monster form. Armed with his demon-slaying sword, he battles the demons to save Liu Li and protect the city.

programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country. A naked man allegedly steals an ATV; a man who apparently was feeding the alligators gets a visit from police; and more.

programme.title: My Strange Arrest (S2)
programme.desc: A look at some of the strangest arrests from across the country: a desperate woman needs to poop during a traffic stop; a mom is busted sneaking into a school dressed as her daughter; and more!

programme.title: The Mafia's Manager
programme.desc: Taiwanese police received a tip off that a mysterious manager in the Taiwanese mafia was getting on a flight to Jakarta. They had just 6 hours to identify him to their counterparts in Jakarta.

programme.title: Cold Case Files: Dead West
programme.desc: When Pam Shelly, 31, is found in her Cuero, Texas, bathroom with a fatal gunshot wound to the head, her death is initially ruled a suicide.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Five women share their harrowing accounts of abduction and imprisonment. They discuss what happens when the news coverage dies down and how they've healed from the trauma they experienced.

programme.title: Beyond The Headlines: The Series
programme.desc: Stories of mothers and fathers who made headlines by committing crimes out of malice, extremism, and desperation.

programme.title: Undercover: Caught On Tape
programme.desc: On his last day as an undercover agent, Bergen County Detective Carlos James experiences his first shootout, and ATF Agent Jenn Eskew poses as a hitwoman to investigate a possible murder for hire.

programme.title: Taking The Stand (S3)
programme.desc: The Wagners stand accused of murdering eight members of the Rhoden family over a bitter child custody dispute.

programme.title: Interrogation Raw (S3)
programme.desc: When police pull over a local man for violating his parole, the case takes a shocking turn when he suddenly confesses to multiple brutal murders.

programme.title: I Survived A Crime (S2)
programme.desc: A prison librarian is held hostage by a desperate inmate who holds a shank to his neck; a motorcyclist and his girlfriend are attacked in the street; a porch pirate is busted; and more.

programme.title: Kindergarten

Know more about different types of weather and changes in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Language
programme.desc: Pag-aralan ang mga salitang magkakatugma, salitang kilos, pang-ukol, at kung paano magsulat ng mga pangungusap nang may tamang baybay at laki ng mga letra.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: Know more about time and nonstandard units of length, mass, and capacity, as well as pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 Reading & Literacy
programme.desc: Identify what are action and describing words, how to sort and classify words, and how to follow directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Makabansa
programme.desc: Alamin ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Aralin ang pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, pagbabasa ng teksto, at kung ano ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: Understand more about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area through square-tile units, alongside pictographs with and without scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: Identify pronouns and prepositions, and how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Pahalagahan ang kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Matuto tungkol sa pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento, at kung paano magsulat ng kuwento at magbigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: Know how to convert time, what are the linear, mass and capacity measures, the area of square and rectangle, bar graphs, and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: Learn more about adjectives, adverbs, maps, graphs, how to read words, and how to restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang mga gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: Find out more about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. Discover the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Suriin ang iba't ibang akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito, at alamin kung paano magsulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: Learn the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: Learn how to write and compose essays, and the nature of Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Alamin ang pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa transisyonal at makabagong panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: Discover the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Pta
programme.desc: Parent-Teacher Activity Time A helpful guide for parents and teachers, this program features essential topics to better support children in the distance learning setup.

programme.title: Grade 6 Filipino
programme.desc: Alamin kung paano magpahayag at magsulat ng sariling opinyon o reaksyon, sumuri ng tekstong binasa o napanood, at gumawa ng dayagram.

programme.title: Grade 6 Math
programme.desc: Learn about the volume of solid figures, meter reading, pie graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 6 English
programme.desc: Know how to compose clear and coherent sentences, and write a persuasive essay.

programme.title: Grade 6 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Unawain at pahalagahan ang patuloy na pagpupunyagi ng mga Pilipino tungo sa pagtugon sa mga hamon ng nagsasarili at umuunlad na bansa.

programme.title: Grade 6 Science
programme.desc: Discover the effects of of earthquakes and volcanic eruptions, the weather patterns and seasons in the Philippines, the Earth’s rotation and revolution, and characteristics of planets in the solar system.

programme.title: Grade 8 Science
programme.desc: Learn about the digestive system, its interactions with other body system, diseases resulting from nutrient deficiency and harmful substances, how cells divide to produce new cells, meiosis, species as a concept, and the one-way flow of energy and the cycling of materials in an ecosystem.

programme.title: Preschool | Eccd
programme.desc: Learn and appreciate the Creator and the Creations, Communication, Cooperation, Relationship, Sense of Purpose

programme.title: Les Nouvelles Aventures De Kaeloo
programme.desc: In Super-Cute-Land, Kaeloo, Stumpy, Quack-Quack and Mr. Cat play a new game every day. And for that they love nothing better than making up their own rules and asking loads of questions about the world around them: with this lot you can never be sure of what will happen next!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Tout Le Monde Veut Prendre Sa Place
programme.desc: The game where everyone wants to be a winner. One quiz, six candidates and, comfortably installed in his chair, one champion... whom everyone dreams of unseating!

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Levy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Magazine
programme.desc: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (1 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc: In Toulon, Jimmy's body is found hanging in his saloon-restaurant, dressed in full cowboy regalia. Clearly a murder disguised as suicide, Marianne's team investigate the world of country dance and western riding enthusiasts. Everyone seems to have adored Jimmy, and yet, several suspects quickly stand out from the crowd.

programme.title: Marianne
programme.desc: An experienced HGV driver is found dead, crushed by the wheels of his lorry. An investigation that immerses Marianne and her team in the world of the long-distance lorry drivers.

programme.title: Les Amants De Brasmort
programme.desc: Brasmort is a barge cemetery. This is where Jean, a down-and-out sailor, and Monique, the daughter of a very rich shipowner, declare their love for each other. But they will need courage to face up to all that separates them.

programme.title: Ya Benti
programme.desc: Sabrina, lesbian, is about to marry Younes, her childhood friend, who is also gay. A marriage that suits both of them because it reassures and delights their families. But on the eve of the ceremony, Sabrina begins to have doubts.

programme.title: Fraiche
programme.desc: At the age of 58 and at the head of a literary programme on the radio, Anne leads a settled and peaceful family life. Until the day she attacks a young woman with incredible violence simply because she offers Anne her seat on the metro.

programme.title: Garcons, Un Film De Genre
programme.desc: In two schools, in Montreal and Matane, the secondary school pupils are invited to participate in the making of a short film in their art and drama classes. The set theme: gender stereotypes. It's the start of a creative process that will take an entire year.

programme.title: Geopolitis
programme.desc: Analysis, explanations, neutrality... ''Geopolitis'' offers an unbiased in-depth look at international current affairs, with accuracy, precision and a constant desire to make an increasingly complex and conflictual world easier to understand.

programme.title: Le Dessous Des Cartes
programme.desc: International relations analysed using geography maps, which are vital to understanding the world in which we live and the challenges it presents.

programme.title: 64' Actu
programme.desc: TV5MONDE's major daily news programme, decrypting the news! What you need to know: the Francophone view of the day's main events. Economics, social debates, international news: the expertise of our journalists. New weekend features: the French-speaking world, social networks, fake news, politics, sport...

programme.title: Allons-Y Franco
programme.desc: Every Friday, journalists from the French-language media and TV5MONDE's partner channels share their views on current affairs.

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Magazine

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Chine, Les Grands Maitres De L'Art
programme.desc: Wang Xijing explores China's landscapes through his brushes. His work between calligraphy and painting reflects a quest for harmony between man and his environment.

programme.title: Pistes Vertes
programme.desc: Christophe Lepetit, baker and restaurateur in Bayeux, created a short supply chain for flour production. He partnered with a farmer in Ryes to install a mill on his farm, right next to the field where the wheat grows. The flour is then sold to local artisans.

programme.title: Le Journal Afrique
programme.desc: All the African news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: L'Actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: L'Invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: Capitaine Tonus
programme.desc: How to eat well, move well, sleep well? In each episode, Captain Stella Tonus of the Body Fleet Federation journeys inside the human body aboard the vessel Positron. Her aim: to teach children about the beneficial or harmful effects of the things they do in their everyday lives.

programme.title: Capitaine Tonus
programme.desc: How to eat well, move well, sleep well? In each episode, Captain Stella Tonus of the Body Fleet Federation journeys inside the human body aboard the vessel Positron. Her aim: to teach children about the beneficial or harmful effects of the things they do in their everyday lives.

programme.title: Capitaine Tonus
programme.desc: How to eat well, move well, sleep well? In each episode, Captain Stella Tonus of the Body Fleet Federation journeys inside the human body aboard the vessel Positron. Her aim: to teach children about the beneficial or harmful effects of the things they do in their everyday lives.

programme.title: La Famille Blaireau-Renard
programme.desc: Edmond is the father of three little badger cubs; all living happily in their sett. One day, he falls in love with Marguerite, a fox! Everything changes when Marguerite and her daughter move into the den; both families now have to find a way to live together in harmony!

programme.title: Bestioles En Questions
programme.desc: As a nature enthusiast, emilie is very interested in the behaviour of insects and other small creatures. What do ants eat? Why are frogs slimy? Can a tortoise catch a cold? No question goes unasked!

programme.title: Les Metiers
programme.desc: To gain a better understanding of some professions, school children explain jobs to their parents in their own words.

programme.title: Ta Vie Sans ca
programme.desc: What would life be like without our most everyday objects? Each episode puts a different one in the spotlight. Whether a tap, an umbrella or a toothbrush, they all have a story to tell about their invention and subsequent evolution.

programme.title: Les Jeux De La Fontaine
programme.desc: Every four years, the best athletes in the animal kingdom gather at the Coubertin Fountain for their own version of the Winter Olympics. Fox, Sheep, She-Wolf, Mouse: they'll all be challenging one another in a series of sporting events in the hope of winning a medal.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Partie De Campagne
programme.desc: Surrounded by fields, near a vast forest and a pretty stream, lies the village of Bellefontaine. It's home to the fun-loving gang of friends Raphaël, Lina, P'tit Pied and Grande Perche. Bubbling over with imagination, they fill every day with exciting adventures.

programme.title: Les Triples
programme.desc: The triplets may look like angels, but they're not the last to get up to mischief... The two brothers and the sister are inseparable and as loving as they are mischievous. The adults need to be brave to channel their energy!

programme.title: Chniwla Et Boubris
programme.desc: Boubris is an introverted lizard who dreams of peace and quiet. A former musician, he fled the hustle and settled away from the world. Until the day Chniwla, a hyperactive and intrusive mosquito, disrupts his daily life.

programme.title: Chniwla Et Boubris
programme.desc: Boubris is an introverted lizard who dreams of peace and quiet. A former musician, he fled the hustle and settled away from the world. Until the day Chniwla, a hyperactive and intrusive mosquito, disrupts his daily life.

programme.title: L'Aventure Du Monde Des Mondes
programme.desc: Dimitri, Raph's and Anaïs's uncle, is a French globetrotter who is fascinated by nature. He gives them tasks to stimulate their creativity. Thanks to Blox, a small robot, they access the ''world of the worlds'', a secret fantasy place where they can play and learn.

programme.title: Kassa Le Messager
programme.desc: At his grandfather's request, Kassa heads off on a mission to discover the culture and history of thirteen African countries.

programme.title: Mission Info
programme.desc: News programme aimed at 7 to 11-year-olds! Each episode, devised for children and their parents, provides insight accessible to younger ones, combined with explanations, immersive reports and expert interviews. An educational quiz also gives children the chance to test their knowledge in a fun way.

programme.title: Ma Vie Avec L'Ia
programme.desc: Theo, a teenager, directly questions artificial intelligence in an attempt to better understand it. He seeks to know what constitutes it, what feeds it, and how it analyzes data.

programme.title: Carbone
programme.desc: Whilst Hydro-Quebec dreams of doubling its production by 2050, to meet the ever-increasing demand for energy, part of the solution lies within our own homes.

programme.title: Falo
programme.desc: A news magazine show, ''Falo'' discusses and analyses current affairs in depth.

programme.title: Objectif Monde L'Hebdo
programme.desc: Report, inquiry, investigation ... ''Objectif Monde L'Hebdo'', a television magazine by French-speaking editorialists, takes time to reflect and analyse through the expert insights and opinions provided by specialists. A TV5MONDE programme, jointly produced with RTS, in collaboration with its francophone partners (RTBF, Radio-Canada, France Televisions).

programme.title: Ding Dong : Montre-Moi Ta Maison !
programme.desc: Giannina Meienhofer takes us on a tour of her big house in Lenggenwil, filled with... dolls! Zurich-based Andreas Gassmann has transformed a lorry into a motor home measuring thirteen metres long and four metres high.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Côte d'Azur.

programme.title: Suisse En Scene
programme.desc: Interview with a key figure from the Swiss cultural scene. An opportunity to look back at their life and career, and the foundations that underpin their work.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Tutsi teenager, Providence Rwayitare escapes the Rwandan genocide by hiding in a church. In the morning, she manages to flee alone. Years later, settled in Belgium, she founded the Muyira association to combine art and memory, raising public awareness about reconstruction after the tragedy.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: A key figure from the world of sport looks back at a particular competition, a career, an outstanding moment.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Papilles
programme.desc: A journey rich in flavour through the regions and their terroirs, exploring local specialities and meeting the artisans perpetuating their age-old culinary traditions. An opportunity to stop off in the kitchen of a talented chef to prepare an emblematic regional recipe.

programme.title: Hep Taxi !
programme.desc: In town or in the countryside, day or night, Jerôme Colin, the presenter-taxi driver leads his prestigious customer on a four-wheel journey conducive to secrets.

programme.title: Le Coeur A L'elevage
programme.desc: Lauriane Henchoz, 17 years old, raises Holstein dairy cows. On her farm in Yverdon, the young apprentice embodies the richness of a living heritage and the challenges of an essential profession.

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S1 ep 7
programme.desc: A clairvoyant repairman fearful of ghosts is forced to help them cross over so they can leave him in peace. On his journey of helping these ghosts with their unfinished businesses, he ends up getting into trouble with their families, friends and the community they are all living in. Will he be able to get these ghosts and their love ones, at the same time face his fear of them?

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Beloved
programme.desc: Friendship takes a violent turn when Adora (played by Nora Aunor) finds that she's a pawn in the intriguing games in life and love being played by her employer and close friend Renee (played by Hilda Koronel.)

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 1
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Afterlife ep 1
programme.desc: Peter, a deceased Filipino-Chinese businessman, returns as a ghost and is bonded to Romy, a Filipino caretaker of a Chinese temple. He sets out to let his family know the whole truth through Romy.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 214
programme.desc: The series is based on the graphic novel created by Carlo J. Caparas. Totoy Bato, a young man, fighting for justice for his lost loved ones; also fighting for equality and fairness against his old friend turned nemesis Dwayne.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Bea Montenegro ep 2
programme.desc: A Sari-Sari Original Series. Hot off the heels from her last cold case, investigative journalist Christine Del Mundo (Maui Taylor) is back with a brand new cold case. This time, it involves actress Bea Montenegro, whose death has only brought forth one suspect - a fellow model who suffers from face blindness.

programme.title: The Last Woman Standing ep 3
programme.desc: After the death of his wife, a man's four mistresses compete against one another to become his next wife, as his wife's ghost continues to haunt them.

programme.title: Di na Muli ep 8

programme.title: Cuerpo Y Alma ep 5
programme.desc: Maya, a young nurse who has been having terrifying nightmares finds out a horrifying truth about a debt that was made to save her life when she was a child. As she's about to find out, the payment just may cost her much more than her life.

programme.title: Carpool ep 4
programme.desc: Carpool' revolves around four individuals whose lives get thrown into chaos after sharing a carpool ride which ended up in a tragic accident. A streak of unfortunate events seemingly taking them down.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 10
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.
